package.name: HTML_QuickForm_Renderer_Tableless
package.summary: Replacement for the default renderer that doesn't use table tags, and generates fully valid XHTML output.
package.description: Replacement for the default renderer of HTML_QuickForm that uses only XHTML and CSS but no table tags, and generates fully valid XHTML output.
package.notes:
In some browser (Firefox < 2.0, Safari 2) the layout of the generated was broken. This release adds two styles to the "form fieldset" as well as to the "form fieldset li" blocks in the stylesheet. (thanks to Brett Bieber for the patch)
Comparisons of all changes to the stylesheet are available: - between release 0.3.4 and release 0.4.1: http://pear.markwiesemann.eu/stylesheet-comparison-0.3.4-0.4.1.txt - between release 0.4.0 and release 0.4.1: http://pear.markwiesemann.eu/stylesheet-comparison-0.4.0-0.4.1.txt
